hadiths.text: It was narrated from Salim that his father said:"I saw people being beaten (in punishment) at the time of the Messenger of Allah for buying food unmeasured and selling it before bringing it to their own camp

chapter.ara-name: باب بَيْعِ مَا يُشْتَرَى مِنَ الطَّعَامِ جُزَافًا قَبْلَ أَنْ يُنْقَلَ مِنْ مَكَانِهِ
chapter.eng-name: .Selling food that one has Bought Unmeasured before removing it from the Place of Sale
